Blacknightmare::

A new sistem in BlackFortress let Blacknightmare knew about Ragnus.
She opened the comm link with Drakfate, as soon as he knew that a new 
bot had born he sent shivah To Hawai.




--- In nbwrpg@y..., "Ragnus _" <ragnus_@h...> wrote:
> In what will be the hawaiian Islands in the future a tectonic 
disruption 
> awakens a volcano that has been dorment for nearly a century.
> 
> But that is not all it awakens...
> 
> The massive energy released from the blast brought online a system 
that was 
> on standby for decades before.  The first system's reactivity 
brought online 
> the massive computer that was Ragnus.
> 
> The behamoth rose slowly, as his joints had not been moved in many 
years.  
> Spreading his wings to thier full thirty two foot span his external 
sensors 
> came online revealing to him the interior of the volcano.  Looking 
up at the 
> mouth of the volcano he crouched low, then using his powerful legs, 
> projected himself upwards.
> 
> As he cleared the volcano's mouth he spread his wings once again, 
only this 
> time with the lightning speed he knew he was capable of.  The 
escaping gases 
> propelled his huge form upwards with great speed.  Looking around 
he scanned 
> for a fresh energy source.  Locating one a few miles to the south 
he set 
> himself in that direction.
> 
> The robotic Red Dragon that was known as Sagnus had finnally risen.
>
